name: Hermit
description:
A metaphor about the frustrations of fitting into a new home.

Keyboard controls are WASD (tank controls movement) and IJKL (directional) and Space.

Gamepads supporting: twin stick + A (Xbox) or X (Dualshock)

Game by: Sierra Asher, William Goddard, Stephen Last.

Global Game Jam 2019 @ Melbourne.
